name: Spikit
description: Spikit is a bullet hell game developed by a single developer, Igor Petrović. With a soundtrack composed by Dario Malešević. In this game, the player will have to dodge a constant barrage of spikes coming from the side of the screen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.5Ghz or better Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

reviews.review_text: This game will keep you wanting to play it over and over again.  Pros: Great Music Unlocks Earn 'Currency' Through Playing, Not Buying It's $0.99 Get It Now.  Cons: Carpel Tunnel Syndrome Nothing Else.  Think of it as a undertale remake without the finnicky rpg and whatnot. Just the battles.
This game is not coded very well as sometimes there will be spikes spawning on other spikes and you cant see them so you dont know where to go and you die and have to restart.
Look at the trailer. That's the game. That's it. It's that simple.  I like it.

I was a little shaky about this and how it was so cheap but man i was wrong music is amazing its so addicting and just like many other games easy to pick up hard to master, im glad i bought this. Get this game if you have the money laying around
